verses.text: KO eni ‘a e me‘a na‘e tuku ke u sio ki ai ‘e ‘Ātonai Sihova; tā ‘oku ne lolotonga ngaohi ha fuifui he‘e, fe‘unga mo e kamata tupu hake ‘a e tei‘ulu: pea tā ko e tei‘ulu hili ‘a e polopolo ‘a e tu‘i.
Pea ‘i he faifai pea ‘osi ‘enau keina ‘a e mohuku kai ‘o e fonua, pea u pehē, ‘Ātonai Sihova ē, fakamolemole mu‘a; he tu‘u fēfē ‘a Sēkope? he ko e si‘i.
Fakatomala ai ‘a Sihova ‘i he mala ko ē: folofola ai ‘a Sihova, ‘E ‘ikai hoko ia.
Ko e me‘a ni na‘e tuku ke u sio ki ai ‘e ‘Ātonai Sihova: tā ‘oku ui mai ‘e ‘Ātonai Sihova ke fai ha hopo ‘aki ha afi: pea hanga ia ‘o keina ‘a e fu‘u moana, ‘io, ‘o ne kamata keina mo e tofi‘a.
Pea u pehē, ‘Ātonai Sihova ē, ma‘u ā mu‘a: ‘e tu‘u fēfē ‘a Sēkope? he ko e si‘i.
Fakatomala ai ‘a Sihova ‘i he mala ko ē, Folofola ai ‘a ‘Ātonai Sihova, ‘E ‘ikai hoko mo ia foki.
Ko e me‘a eni na‘a ne tuku ke u sio ki ai; pea tā ‘oku tu‘u ‘a ‘Ātonai ‘i ha funga ‘ā ne ngaohi ‘aki ha fakavai, pea ‘oku ‘i hono nima ha fuavai.

Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, “‘Ēmosi, ko e hā ‘oku ke sio ni ki ai?” Pea u tali, Ko e fuavai. Pea folofola ‘a ‘Ātonai, Ko au eni ‘oku ou ‘ai ha fuavai ki he lotolotonga ‘o hoku kakai ‘Isileli: ‘e ‘ikai te u toe lakai ia.
Pea ‘e lala ‘a e ngaahi sia ‘o ‘Aisake, pea ‘e faka‘auha ‘a e ngaahi faletapu ‘o ‘Isileli; pea te u tuku ke fai mo e fale ‘o Selopoame ‘aki ‘a e heletā.

Pea ‘alu ai ‘a e fekau ‘a ‘Amasaia ko e taula‘eiki ‘o Pēteli kia Selopoame ko e Tu‘i ‘Isileli, ke fakahā, Kuo puleaki‘i koe ‘e ‘Ēmosi ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e fale ‘o ‘Isileli: ‘oku ‘ikai lava ‘e he fonua ke matu‘uaki ‘ene ngaahi lea.
He ko eni ‘a e lea ‘oku fai ‘e ‘Ēmosi, Tokua ‘e mate ‘a Selopoame ‘i he heletā, pea ‘e mātu‘aki taki pōpula ‘a ‘Isileli mei hono kelekele.
Pea lea ‘a ‘Amasaia kia ‘Ēmosi, Si‘i tongafisi, ‘alu: fei mo hola ki he fonua ‘o Siuta, pea ke kai me‘akai ‘i he potu ko ia, pea fai ‘i he potu ko ia ho‘o palofisai.
Kae‘oua te ke toe palofisai ‘i Pēteli; he ko e falelotu ia ‘o e tu‘i, pea ko e fale fakapule‘anga.
Pea tali ‘e ‘Ēmosi, ‘o ne pehē kia ‘Amasaia, Na‘e ‘ikai ko e palōfita au, pea na‘e ‘ikai te u kau ki ha‘a palōfita; ka ko e tauhimanu au, mo e tama tele sukamino:
pea na‘e to‘o au ‘e Sihova mei he muimui ki he tākanga, pea folofola mai ‘a Sihova, ‘Alu ‘o fai palofisai ki hoku kakai ‘Isileli,
pea ko eni fanongo ā ki he folofola ‘a Sihova: ‘Oku ke pehē mai ‘e koe, ‘oua te ke palofisai ki ‘Isileli, pea ‘oua ‘e mokulu ho‘o lea ki he fale ‘o ‘Aisake.

Ko ia ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova, ‘E hoko ho uaifi ko e pa‘umutu ‘i he kolo, pea ko ho‘o fānau tangata mo fānau fefine te nau tō ‘i he heletā, pea ‘e tufa ho kelekele ‘aki ‘a e afo; pea te ke pekia ‘e koe ‘i ha kelekele ‘oku ta‘ema‘a, pea ‘e mātu‘aki ‘ave pōpula ‘a ‘Isileli mei hono kelekele.
